Stir in 2 14 ounce cans of beef broth, 1 14.5 ounce can of tomatoes and 2 cups of sliced carrots, then season with 1/4 tsp. of salt and 1/4 tsp. of pepper. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer 15 minutes.
